group_1.textRight: Hmm... In that case...
There's one more way.
It's not like I have a clear-cut example or@anything, but...
You might need to set it up so you@HAVE TO give him the chocolate.
A must-give situation...
We just need to figure out exactly what@a must-give situation is...
Chocolate...[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]what?

group_1.textLeft: Can't go wrong with this year's hit move.@It was in a magazine.

group_1.narration: "Perfect for you and those cold feet!"
"Grasp the chocolate firmly in both hands@and ask a friend for a timely push!@Crash that chocolate right into your crush!"

group_1.textRight: I don't quite follow the logic.

group_1.textLeft: You know, kinda like pretending to bump @into someone to get their attention?

group_1.textRight: An unexpected...physical attack...
No.

group_1.textLeft: Well, okay... [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:motion_200][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Then how about the "You've@got chocolate in your hair" move?!

group_1.textRight: Right away, I'd have to say that seems a@little...
Absurd.
Put down the magazine.
We've gone off track from thinking up a@"must-give situation".
True... We should come up with something@on our own.
Hmm... What could work...?
A situation where something will happen@if you don't give him the chocolate?
Because, if you don't, it'll be...really bad.

group_1.textCenter: B-because if you don't, something bad is @going to happen!

group_1.narration: Th-they're gonna read my Book of Top@Secret Fantasies to everyone!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Oh, no, no, no, NOOO! Anything but THAT!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
[chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! D-don't scare me like that...

group_1.textLeft: (I...I know it was all in my head, but that@felt too real!)

group_1.textRight: Hmm. I think we're out of ideas.

group_1.textLeft: B-but, but! What am I supposed to do?!@I can't miss this chance!
I'm sure he'd accept it if I could just@get it to him!
I guess the Chocolate CRASH is my @only hope!

group_1.textRight: P-please don't...
Are you really certain this boy will accept @your chocolate?

group_1.textLeft: He got chocolate from one of my classmates@who passed them out to everyone last year.

group_1.textRight: Why not use that strategy yourself?
NOT giving him chocolate in that situation@would be even more awkward.
Think you can do it?

group_1.textLeft: Yup! Sounds better than eating the@chocolate myself after missing this chance!
This year for sure...[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:motion_200][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]I will give him @my chocolate!
